transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji, Ranveer ji, very good morning. Deepika baat kar rahi hu from IndiaMART se.
Customer: Uh.
Executive: Haanji, Ranveer ji, mai aapse ye discuss kar rahi thi aapki current trending service IndiaMART pe chal rahi hai SMS organic, right sir?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haanji, to mujhe ye bataiye sir apna kaisa business kaisa chal raha hai? Kal aapse aapke account manager Deepika unse aapka discussion hua tha aur fir aapne unhe not satisfied mark kiya. Koi specific reason sir aapko.
Customer: Ek bhi customer nahi milta aapka. Ek bhi customer nahi milta. Pata nahi kaise customer IndiaMART deta hai. But agar aap. Mai thak chuka baat karte karte.
Executive: Okay. Ek aadmi bhi to dhanka mile.
Customer: Ek boli bhi bikwai ho IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achha. Maine kal Deepika se kiya tha. Mai mujhme kami hai ya kya naam hai tumme kami hai ye batao.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Isse achha to gaon wale le jaate hai. Shikohabad mein itna maal jaata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Samajh gayi mai aapki baat. But mai aapse ek cheez kehna chahungi sir, really sorry. Wo feedback aapke account manager ke liye tha aur aapne not satisfied mark kiya. To aapko account manager se to koi specific reason nahi hoga na sir.
Customer: Dekho ek baat hai, seekh seekh apne se chhoto ko di jaati hai. Isliye not satisfied hai. Wo jo samne wale ki kya naam hai wohi na samjhe ki kisi bhi samay utha ke baat kar lo, kuch use seekh dene lago. Mai buddha aadmi hu 70 saal ka. Achha khasa kaam chal raha hai mera.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hai na? Mujhe kya seekh dete ho tum bhai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, koi aapko seekh nahi de sakta. Hum khud aapse seekhenge sir. Aap itne bade buzurg hai, humare bade hai aap. I really respect you sir. But mai haanji. Mujhe ye bataiye sir jaise aap jo leads ka consumption kar rahe hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Uspe aapka kya response aa raha hai? Aap apne UP UP mein hi deal kar rahe honge na if I am not wrong?
Customer: Bahar koi ye business aisa hai bahar koi transport ka dikhta.
Customer: Ab kul original khad ₹6 bech rahe ho. Kul ₹6.
Customer: Lekin koi customer nahi milta. Bahar wale ka jab loading hoga to uska paisa kaun dega?
Customer: Be matlab apna time to phone pe aur customer mile na. Kya jarurat hai?
Customer: Aaram se baithe hai apna.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ji, namaste.
Executive: But aapki namaste sir. But mera request aapse ye tha ki agar thoda sa hum in detail discuss kar lete ki request aapse bas mai ek vinamra nivedan karungi. Please aap services ko proper use kariye. Aap 6 mahine se service chala rahe hai aur aapko aage business milega sir. But request hogi is zyada se zyada order kariye.
Customer: Seekh kya hai? Koshish karte hai. Abhi to mera kaam me vyast hu meri labour kaam kar rahi hai.
Executive: Achha labour kaam kar rahi hai. To aap kis time pe free rahenge? Kuch idea de dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haanji, chaliye theek hai namaste sir.
Customer: Ji ji, theek hai. Chaliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough customers through IndiaMART.

- Feels that the executive is giving unnecessary advice.

- No sales through IndiaMART.

- Outside transport costs are too high.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the customer's dissatisfaction.

- Executive requested the customer to use services properly.

- Asked for a convenient time to discuss the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at a later time.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer service, business
